channel.title: Residence
channel.description:
So, what do you think? Should residence be removed and just replaced with LWC, if so how would you like to see it all? Please provide reasoning behind what you're saying.
I personally think residence should be removed and replaced with 2 LWC locks.
Maybe you have a different idea all together?

item.title: Residence
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9, post:71, topic:412620”][quote author=Tom_BETA link=topic=514098.msg3733178#msg3733178 date=1314739238]

He is saying that certain blocks aren’t rolled back, and he is right.

Then don’t build out of them.
[/quote]
People still see decoration value in these blocks and used right they can make some good structures. I think they should be logged and instead rolled back on a case-by-case basis.[/quote]

No logging/rolling back software that I know of has that ability, to roll back except these blocks.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“Tom_BETA, post:43, topic:412620”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=514098.msg3733175#msg3733175 date=1314739210]
He is saying that certain blocks aren’t rolled back, and he is right.
[/quote]

Then don’t build out of them.[/quote]
People still see decoration value in these blocks and used right they can make some good structures. I think they should be logged and instead rolled back on a case-by-case basis.

you guys do realize after the last reset mitb said he will never reset again so i dont know why you guys are even trying
[/quote]

What’s worth the prize is always worth the fight.[/quote]

your never gonna win because theres a simple fix if you want a reset just leave everything you have and go to new generated chunks and build again

item.title: Residence
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:63, topic:412620”][quote author=acet1997 link=topic=514098.msg3733876#msg3733876 date=1314787818]
i think its fine like it is cause its gets really annoying when ur place gets greifed and mods dont care about rolling it back and not everyone can use hawk and bb stick
[/quote]

Well report the damn griefing. There’s a reason why there’s a forums section dedicated to reporting rule breakers.[/quote]But hawk is shit and never works lol

[quote=“Travas, post:61, topic:412620”][quote author=Nokturth link=topic=514098.msg3733779#msg3733779 date=1314767683]
if there’s a map reset, can the map be uploaded? xD
[/quote]
I think MITB was going to upload our last map, but it was so large he decided not too.[/quote]
He should put it up as a torrent or something, if we do have a reset.

Read full topic

item.title: Residence
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

So I’m glad everyone likes the 2 world idea. I heard someone mention it before (Tom I think?) and I really liked the idea so I thought I would bring it up.

LilXCj:

One free-build, another survival.

^I wanted this, but I was fairly sure no one else would like the idea. It’s fine if it isn’t free build: as long as we have creeper explosions, TNT, and no res, then It’ll be great.

Read full topic

item.title: Residence
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw

[/quote]
i agree i would like to wait till 1.8 since the worlds wont be compatible with the old maps so wait till 1.8 comes out and just completely start a new world.[/quote]

you do realize by that he meant in currently generated chunks right? new chunks are fine

Read full topic

item.title: Residence
item.dc:creator: @Nokturth Nokturth
item.description:
@Nokturth wrote:

hat trix:

i say no white list, not EVERYONE can just log in, they have to create new accounts. make it to where people can only create 2 accounts per ip, 1 active account at a time. that way if they get banned twice from the server. they are done for good.

you can’t do that, some ips reset everyday (mine for example) and if people have brothers, cousins, friends, whoever that uses the same internet and plays in mopar, they just couldn’t do it at the same time?
not practical

Read full topic

item.title: Residence
item.dc:creator: @darkovlp darkovlp
item.description:
@darkovlp wrote:

Moparisthebest:

But he already did?

Yes. Indeed one of our monuments is an obsidian and iron eagle(with a few diamond and gold blocks), just for that we use at least 170 iron block, you can check it out in the “minecraft art” section.

Read full topic

item.title: Residence
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

[quote=“Travas, post:49, topic:412620”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=514098.msg3733316#msg3733316 date=1314745313]RESET.
[/quote]
THIS.

Or maybe a second world would be nice, whoever enjoys the crappy res plugin can play on world 1, whoever wants to survive with creeper explosions, TNT explosions, no res, etc can play on world 2.[/quote]

would have to make sure the worlds cannot be accessed between each other, because then the people with res would go raid the people without it, making it completely unfair because we cant raid them back

i say get rid of res, 2 or 3 chest locks, and reset.

i say no white list, not EVERYONE can just log in, they have to create new accounts. make it to where people can only create 2 accounts per ip, 1 active account at a time. that way if they get banned twice from the server. they are done for good.

Read full topic

Enable a whitelist so we don’t get people testing their stupid ass hacking clients.

item.title: Residence
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“xx matty xx, post:46, topic:412620”]Getting rid of residence now would be stupid. We should never have had it in the first place, but now people who have taken advantage of res will need to change everything.

Everyone would have to use up their massive chest library, people like badger+friends would have to remove all their metal blocks etc. Most people living around spawn (because of the protection res offers) will have to abandon their shit and move out. Everyone connected to my station would probably start getting griefed because people can just walk in etc.[/quote]cough RESET.

Could also implement anti-xray mod at same time…

Read full topic
